TheHunted:EerieGlow.NAME: Eerie Glow
TheHunted:EerieGlow.FLAVOR: You pulse intermittently, like a cheap neon sign in a red light district.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your unblocked attacks randomly apply vulnerable, frail, or weak.

TheHunted:ImmuneResponse.NAME: Immune Response
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain a debuff, also gain a random buff of equal length.

TheHunted:Perseverance.NAME: Perseverance
DESCRIPTIONS: When you shuffle your deck, gain ground.

TheHunted:PlaceholderRelic.NAME: Placeholder Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain +1 hotness.

TheHunted:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain +1 Strength.

TheHunted:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
TheHunted:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
